typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [WideWorldImporters].[dbo].[Persons1];',
	format: 'query') ~> Sourcetb2
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [WideWorldImportersDW].[dbo].[Persons3];',
	format: 'query') ~> Sourcetb1
Sourcetb2, Sourcetb1 join(Sourcetb2@LastName == Sourcetb1@LastName,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PersonID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> target
